message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! I think it's a game-changer and I'm confident you'll love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $9500.
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8500. I'm willing to pay a bit more, but I'd like to get a better deal.

Thank you for your offer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm willing to meet you halfway and offer the product to you for $9000. This is the lowest price I'm comfortable with, considering the value the product brings.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $8000 for the product. I think that's a fair price considering the value it will bring to me.
I understand your budget constraints, Bob. I'm willing to make one more concession. I'll offer the product to you for $8200. This is as low as I can go without losing money on the deal.
I appreciate your concession, Alice. I'm willing to pay $7800 for the product. I think that's a fair price, and I'm willing to make a commitment to purchase it if we can meet at this price.
